title: Patch 6.17 - Causing me to lag?
body:
So the latest patch was released a few days ago and as of late I have been lagging in my games, mainly just higher ping than usual. It doesn't happen every game but it happens way more than it should be for myself as it pretty much never happens to me. Has anybody else had the same problem as I have? Just lagging when you know you shouldn't be? Because it feels like the new patch has been causing it. Somebody I played with in a ranked game before said he seemed to be lagging lately since the new patch came out as well.

There was also the time where I was playing ARAM games and when everyone was 100% it would just sit there for a while. Then I close and reconnect to my game and it said something like "Your internet connection is not..." Something to do with the game not being connected to the internet anyway. So I'd relog and it would work. I'd only be around 40 seconds into the game but even then that does not happen. It happened for a few games but then that disappeared.


I'm not sure if I can get help or any opinions with this but I'm just putting it out there.

replies.body: For the past 5 or so days I will get random ping that hovers around 150 - 200. It's also around 4pm to 6pm. No issues after 6pm though.

Yes I'M lagging as well when i wasn't before patch 6.17. IDK what happened but i put a ticket in 3 days ago I've reset my router restarted my computer even uninstalled lol and reinstalled it idk what is going on.

with the new patch i am also having a lots of lag even if i playing with a stable ping (65ms). i am having some weird lags like some kind of frames dropping
i hope riot games check this post and look for what s going on 
i got a friend who s having the same lag with the same ping (65 ms) 
:/
I haven't been lagging, sounds odd that you are. If you can, try restarting your router as this can fix some issues. Otherwise I would try sending in a support ticket if the issue persists
I have gotten lag, even though no one else was using the internet. Not sure if it's the patch or not though..
